files.patch: @@ -46,1 +46,1 @@ - * When a resource scope is closed, it is no longer alive (see {@link #isAlive()}, and subsequent operation on + * When a resource scope is closed, it is no longer alive (see {@link #isAlive()}, and subsequent operations on @@ -78,1 +78,2 @@ - * As a results, resources associated to the global scope are never cleaned up. + * As a results, the global scope will never attempt to release resources associated with it. Such resources must, where + * needed, be managed independently by clients.
